name: Classic Car Rider - Fast Car Driving Game
name_original: Classic Car Rider - Fast Car Driving Game
description:
Wait, hold on, it’s not easy to drive in opposite lane when there are lots of cars coming across you.
So you think you can ride across this busy route street so easily? Well if yes, then try this cool simple game
Basically it’s a tap game where you need to tap left/right to change the lane

Gameplay
• Tap left to move left
• Tap right to move right
